title: Top Places to visit in Naharlagun, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Naharlagun is a town situated in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh.
 
Geography
It is at an altitude of 155 meters from sea level. Surrounded by mountains, Naharlagun is a city that sees annual long monsoon rains. The weather is s
